title: Logo/Icon Proposal
body: Hi good day! Im Jibbie Eguna, a graphics designer, I would like to ask for your permission to propose a new designs of logo in your application/project. I would like to help projects in open-source .I would just like to propose new designs. Hoping for your positive response Thank You!

title: Missing Birthday Adapter's reminder flexibility in Birthday Calendar's settings
body:
Hi Sascha, I liked (maybe loved?) and used _Birthday Adapter_ - the app _Birthday Calendar_ is based on - (and I'm still using it up to now), and for sure it's really great that you brought the concept to the next level by creating _Birthday Calendar_. But why to hell you shriveled up _Birthday Adapter's_ fantastic reminder concept with its three reminders that were able to be set to any daytime to only to simple reminders?? Please, bring (back?) _Birthday Adapter's_ glorious reminders to _Birthday Calendar_ - I'm really being you!

_(**Rem.:** Nix f√ºr ungut, aber ich finde die Konfigurierbarkeit der Reminder echt eine der praktischsten Funktionen beim Birthday Adapter! ;-))_

title: logo design for the project
body: Hi, I want to design a new logo for the project completely free...

title: Add possibility to choose another calendar
body:
Hi,
Can u add the possibility to choose an other calendar for saving the data (eg. an caldav one)?

title: Make notification time configurable
body: I really love this app but I would like to have the option to define the time I get notified of birthdays. Currently you only can set it to notify you on the same day and one before, but not the time this notification occurs.

title: Buttons in the readme.md
body: This PR moves the buttons to download the app to the top and adds one for F-Droid.

title: Relicense from Apache to GPLv3
body:
I haven't found a way to contact you in private so I am opening an issue for this:
This is a fork of https://github.com/SufficientlySecure/birthday-calendar so please adhere to the license and use GPLv3! If you want to discuss details email me at dominik@dominikschuermann.de

I don't really understand why you did this. Why not contribute to the original project?
